remarks.para: Refer to the enumeration constant D3D12_FEATURE_SHADER_MODEL in the enumeration.

When used with the function, before calling the function initialize the HighestShaderModel field to the highest shader model that your application understands. After the function completes successfully, the HighestShaderModel field contains the highest shader model that is both supported by the device and no higher than the shader model passed in.

summary.para: Specifies one member of that indicates the maximum supported shader model.
